properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: Specifies the title's alignment in a horizontal direction.

properties.name: placeholderSize
properties.description: Reserves a pixel-measured space for the title.

properties.name: textOverflow
properties.description: Specifies what to do with the title when it overflows the allocated space after applying [wordWrap]: hide, truncate it and display an ellipsis, or do nothing.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: Specifies the title's alignment in a vertical direction.

properties.name: wordWrap
properties.description: Specifies how to wrap the title if it does not fit into a single line.
